docs.snippet: Mel Kiper Jr., ESPN’s lead N.F.L. draft expert, is no longer producing his comprehensive guide....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mel Kiper Jr., ESPN’s lead N.F.L. draft expert, is no longer producing his comprehensive guide.
docs.abstract: Box Seats column; Mel Kiper Jr, ESPN's lead NFL draft expert, is no longer producing his annual draft report--a 150-page-or-so guide that fed NFL draft obsession since 1979; for the 2014 NFL draft, and in the future, subscribers are on their own.

headline.seo: ESPN’s Mel Kiper Jr. Is No Longer Producing His N.F.L. Draft Guide
headline.main: Out of Print, if Not Off Clock
headline.print_headline: Out of Print, if Not Off Clock

docs.abstract: It is unclear who New York Giants will pick in first-round of the 2014 NFL draft; with 12th selection, Giants could possibly have multiple worthwhile choices.
